title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 7, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 7, 2021
description:
Mark and Adam are joined by Geragos & Geragos attorney Dan Lust who focuses on sports law and they discuss the Cleveland baseball/roller derby situation and the developing accusations being levied against NHL player Evander Kane. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
